body_html: I now understand that this bug was caused because tf.data.Dataset.from_tensor_slices stores the entire dataset in the TF graph. There is a comment on the datasets guide about this. This also causes my TensorBoard and checkpoint files to be enormous.
body_text: I now understand that this bug was caused because tf.data.Dataset.from_tensor_slices stores the entire dataset in the TF graph.  There is a comment on the datasets guide about this.  This also causes my TensorBoard and checkpoint files to be enormous.
body: I now understand that this bug was caused because tf.data.Dataset.from_tensor_slices stores the entire dataset in the TF graph.  There is a comment on [the datasets guide](https://www.tensorflow.org/programmers_guide/datasets) about this.  This also causes my TensorBoard and checkpoint files to be enormous.
